origin_description: Forensic scientist struck by a lightning bolt infused with chemicals, granting him super-speed.
superpowers: Super speed, time travel, phasing through objects, rapid healing

origin_description: An astronaut chosen by a sentient ring to join the Green Lantern Corps and protect the universe.
superpowers: Power ring constructs, flight, energy projection, universal translate
catch_phrase: In brightest day, in blackest night, no evil shall escape my sight!

origin_description: A young man bitten by a radioactive spider who fights crime in New York City while balancing everyday life.
superpowers: Wall-crawling, spider-sense, super strength, agility, web-shooting
catch_phrase: With great power comes great responsibility.

origin_description: Genius billionaire who built a powered armor suit to save his life and protect the world.
superpowers: Powered armor suit: flight, repulsor blasts, AI assistance, super strength

origin_description: Norse god of thunder from Asgard, wielding the magic hammer Mjolnir.
superpowers: Godlike strength, control over lightning and storms, longevity, flight via Mjolnir

origin_description: A scientist exposed to gamma radiation who transforms into the Hulk when enraged.
superpowers: Unlimited strength based on rage, regeneration, high resistance to injury

origin_description: A World War II veteran enhanced by a super-soldier serum, now a symbol of justice and freedom.
superpowers: Enhanced strength, agility, endurance, expert tactician, uses vibranium shield
catch_phrase: I can do this all day.
